Topic.Title: Nothing Appearing in the Desktop Version

Posts.EditableText: Hello! I recently downloaded Quest for the first time, but I can't get the Windows version to work. I can load a game or start creating a new game, but it won't give me any options to actually do anything with those files. I'm running Windows 10 and I've included some screenshots of what exactly my screen looks like.
Posts.HTML: Hello! I recently downloaded Quest for the first time, but I can't get the Windows version to work.
